entry.title: Monday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections this afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 06:11 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late this evening then cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 60 gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 06:11 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:11 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023
